entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, La Scie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:54 p.m. NDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.2Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Scie 11:30 PM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023
Temperature: -1.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -4.1°C
Wind: SSE 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. Snow beginning near midnight. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High 6.
entry.summary: Snow changing to drizzle and ending near noon then mainly cloudy. Blowing snow over exposed areas early in the morning. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 in the afternoon. High 6. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023
